title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat, multi-model, file upload, RAG, user management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI (Rust) for browsing, pulling, and chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; Spring Boot starters included.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger CI module that caches and serves Ollama models inside your pipeline for integration tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated list of 30+ community packages on npm: wrappers, CLI tools, Express middleware, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI index showing 25+ libraries including official ollama, langchain-ollama, ollama-rag, etc.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama integrations.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp and local LLM deployment strategies.

title: Ollama Discord bots roundup
summary: GitHub topic aggregating 15+ open-source Discord bots that plug into Ollama for chat & moderation.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that adds a chat interface widget backed by any Ollama model.
